name: Panda (StevenZhang)
description: The game starts with Panda's POV. You will see four bars which are rest, hunger, thirst, and health. When the rest, thirst, or hunger become 0, then it will decrease the health. When health becomes 0, then Panda will die and your game is over.  The only goal is to keep Panda alive. However, there are a lot of things that can cause Panda's death: lack of rest, starvation, thirst, predators, etc.
